message: Assumptions aren't answers.
True stuff Rayan

NAFTA didn't kill American jobs, the Tbagger owners moved their factories to Mexico. I was working at MN Rubber Co. in St. Louis Park MN in 2000. It is part of the Quadion Corp. The machines were moved to its new factory in Mexico. The St. Louis plant was the most profitable plant in the company. The Mexico plant struggled to make good parts. It was bleeding money. Yet the St. Louis Park MN plant was the one closed. The owner was the son of the company founder. The St. Louise Park MN plant was the birth place of the company. It was torn down and the land sold and upscale condos now sit there. The owner is a rightwing Tbagger.

Nice recitation of Fox news talking points. Have you travelled to Europe and actually talked to foreign people? I travelled to Europe 10 times between 2001-2007, and George Bush was considered a Nazi, much like his father and grandfather. I see no evidence of the Constitution being shredded for Shiria Law. Sharia Law is not very common in the Muslim World, much less in America. That would be like saying, """"America Lynches Black folks"""" based on looking at the Klan in the segregation days. Your whole construct is based on fallacy, therefore you are an Idiot.

Now he is differentiating between illegals and legals, before it was an offensive generalization. However, I still don't see how this man can secure our borders better than other politicians. He could have all the money in the world and still lack political presence. He's all show and we are all making him wealthier with all this propaganda. Weak up people! America needs a serious, eloquent, and transparent leader, not a clown.
I had to read the headline three times to make sure I got it right

Carter, you earned those beautiful battle scars. Be proud of every one of them. You fought the fierce battle and came out a winner! Our seven year old great granddaughter went through open heart surgery and shows off her scar. God is watching over you, Carter, and even though those scars are visible, you have such beauty on the inside. Those scars will fade in time, not all the way, but everytime you see them in the mirror, just remember that when God brings you to it, He will bring you through it. Good luck, young man, our prayers go out to you. There will be so many kids asking to see them, and admire you for what you have been through.
